name: Phonetic Classification
description: Groups letters by their articulation properties such as vowels, consonants, and Maheshvara Sutras.

name: 36 Tattvas of Kashmir Shaivism
description: Organizes letters based on their evolution from basic to complex forms, reflecting their phonetic and metaphysical significance.

name: Trisharira Classification
description: Classifies letters based on their association with the three bodies

name: Guna Classification
description: Groups letters based on their qualities or gunas, such as Sattva, Rajas, and Tamas.

name: Shakti Traya Classification
description: Classifies letters based on the three divine energies: Iccha Shakti, Jnana Shakti, and Kriya Shakti.

name: Chakra Classification
description: Organizes letters according to their association with the seven chakras, reflecting their energetic properties.

name: Nada, Bindu, and Varna Classification
description: Classifies letters based on their association with Nada (sound), Bindu (point), and Varna (letter), reflecting their spiritual significance.

name: Shiva, Shakti, and Bindu Classification
description: Classifies letters based on their association with the divine principles of Shiva, Shakti, and Bindu, reflecting their spiritual significance.

name: Shabda Brahman Classification
description: Organizes letters based on their association with the concept of Shabda Brahman, the ultimate reality in sound and vibration.

name: Mala and Japa Classification
description: Classifies letters based on their use in mala (prayer beads) and japa (chanting), reflecting their spiritual significance.
